SEARCH
程序包 io.github.moyusowo.neoartisanapi.api.item

接口 ArtisanItem.Builder

封闭接口:
ArtisanItem
public static interface ArtisanItem.Builder
Builder interface for simple custom items.

Usage example: 


 ArtisanItem newItem = ArtisanItem.builder()
     .registryId(new NamespacedKey(plugin, "sword"))
     .rawMaterial(Material.DIAMOND_SWORD)
     .displayName("Legendary Sword")
     .build();

  • 方法详细资料

    • registryId

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder registryId(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey registryId)
      Sets the unique identifier key for the item.
      参数:
      registryId - the unique identifier key for the item (cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if registryId is null

    • rawMaterial

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder rawMaterial(@NotNull @NotNull Material rawMaterial)
      Sets the base material type for the item.
      参数:
      rawMaterial - base material type (cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if rawMaterial is null
      另请参阅:
      • Material

    • hasOriginalCraft

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder hasOriginalCraft(boolean hasOriginalCraft)
      Sets whether to preserve vanilla crafting recipes.
      参数:
      hasOriginalCraft - true to preserve vanilla crafting, false to disable (disabled by default)
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • customModelData

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder customModelData(@Nullable @Nullable CustomModelData customModelData)
      Sets the custom model data for the item.
      参数:
      customModelData - custom model data ID (must be greater than 0)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if customModelData ≤ 0

    • displayName

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder displayName(@Nullable @Nullable String displayName)
      Sets the display name for the item (support minimessage format).
      参数:
      displayName - item display name (cannot be null or empty string)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if displayName is null or empty

    • displayName

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder displayName(@Nullable @Nullable net.kyori.adventure.text.Component component)
      Sets the display name for the item using adventure API text component.
      参数:
      component - item display name (cannot be null or empty string)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if displayName is null or empty

    • lore

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder lore(@NotNull @NotNull List<String> lore)
      Sets the Lore description for the item.
      参数:
      lore - item description text list
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if lore is null

    • loreComponent

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder loreComponent(@NotNull @NotNull List<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> lore)
      Sets the Lore description for the item using adventure API text components.
      参数:
      lore - item description text list
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if lore is null

    • foodProperty

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder foodProperty(int nutrition, float saturation, boolean canAlwaysEat)
      Sets the food properties for the item.
      参数:
      nutrition - nutrition value
      saturation - saturation level
      canAlwaysEat - whether it can be eaten when full
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • foodProperty

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder foodProperty(int nutrition, float saturation, boolean canAlwaysEat, @NotNull @NotNull Map<PotionEffect,Float> effectChance, float consumeSeconds)
      Sets the food properties for the item with effects.
      参数:
      nutrition - nutrition value
      saturation - saturation level
      canAlwaysEat - whether it can be eaten when full
      effectChance - map of potion effects and their chances
      consumeSeconds - time to consume in seconds
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • weaponProperty

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder weaponProperty(float speed, float knockback, float damage)
      Sets the weapon properties for the item.
      参数:
      speed - attack speed
      knockback - knockback strength
      damage - base damage value
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • maxDurability

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder maxDurability(int maxDurability)
      Sets the maximum durability value for the item.
      参数:
      maxDurability - maximum durability value (must be greater than 0)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if maxDurability ≤ 0

    • armorProperty

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder armorProperty(int armor, int armorToughness, @Nullable @Nullable EquipmentSlot slot)
      Sets the armor property configuration for the item.
      参数:
      armor - armor value
      armorToughness - armor toughness
      slot - equipment slot (null inherits template item's wear position, if none then cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • attributeProperty

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder attributeProperty(@NotNull @NotNull AttributeProperty attributeProperty)
      Sets the attribute system configuration for the item.
      参数:
      attributeProperty - attribute system configuration (cannot be null, use AttributeProperty.empty() for no attributes)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      抛出:
      IllegalArgumentException - if attributeProperty is null
      另请参阅:
      • AttributeProperty

    • blockId

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder blockId(@Nullable @Nullable NamespacedKey blockId)
      Sets the custom block that is placed when the item is right-clicked.
      参数:
      blockId - block ID (cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance
      另请参阅:
      • ArtisanBaseBlock

    • itemModel

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder itemModel(@Nullable @Nullable NamespacedKey itemModel)
      Sets the custom model for the item.
      参数:
      itemModel - the namespace key of the custom model (cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • skullProperty

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder skullProperty(@NotNull @NotNull String textureUrl, boolean isBase64)
      If the item's Material is PLAYER_HEAD, this method can be used to set the skull texture.

      If the item's Material is not PLAYER_HEAD, this method has no effect

      参数:
      textureUrl - skull texture URL or corresponding Base64 encoding (cannot be null)
      isBase64 - whether the provided string is Base64 encoded
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • internalUse

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder internalUse()
      Marks as internal use only. When marked, this item will not appear in tab-complete, guide book and collections returned by registry.
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • tags

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder tags(@NotNull @NotNull Set<String> tags)
      Sets the tags for this item
      参数:
      tags - set of tags (cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • category

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem.Builder category(@NotNull @NotNull NamespacedKey category)
      Sets the category for this item
      参数:
      category - category namespace key (cannot be null)
      返回:
      current builder instance

    • build

      @NotNull @NotNull ArtisanItem build()
      Builds the custom item with the given parameters.
      返回:
      the built custom item instance
